description: Impose changing concentrations of reduced RCP7.0 short lived gas species. Beginning in 2014 with air quality policies (or maximum feasible reductions) applied to the SSP3-7 NTCF emissions.
name: RCP70 Reduced Short Lived Gas Species
longName: Reduced Representative Concentration Pathway 7.0 Short Lived Gas Species
keywords: Representative Concentration Pathway 7.0, future, 21st century, SSP3, RCP7.0, reduced short lived gas species
